#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

void ComputeFact( int n ) {
		
	vector<int> A( 2000 );
	int i, m, carry, x, j;
	
	A[ 0 ] = 1;
	m = 1;
	
	for( i = 1;i <= n;i++ ) {
		
		carry = 0;
		for( j = 0;j < m;j++ ) {
			
			x = ( A[ j ] * i ) + carry;
			A[ j ] = x % 10;
			carry = x/10;
		}
		while( carry > 0 ) {
			
			A[ m++ ] = carry%10;
			carry /= 10;
		}
	}
	
	for( i = ( m - 1 );i >= 0;i-- )
		printf("%d", A[ i ] );
	printf("\n");
	 
}

int main() {
	
	int t, n;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n );
		ComputeFact( n );		
	}
	return 0;
}
